documentation.synopsis: This App hold modem powering up process with an without magnet, in order to boot them up in config or in communication mode. When a modem configuration is required (scheduled), we follow this procedure : * Power down the modem, * Power up the electromagnet, * Power up the modem, * Publish MODEM_CONFIGURATION_REQUIRED="master" or "slave" depending the conf we need, * When receiving "MODEM_IS_ALIVE" = true, power down the magnet, * When receiving "MODEM_CONFIGURATION_COMPLETE" = true, reboot the modem by powering it down and up.

moosvar.varinfo: A boolean setted to true when iModem receive some mtAlive messages, means that the magnet can be powered off.
A boolean setted to true by iModem when the configuration process is complete.
A string that signal to iModem that we need to change modem configuration. The role asked has to be contained in that string ("master" or "slave")
